title: Visiting Students | Icahn School of Medicine
description: Qualified Students currently attending other American or International Medical Schools are welcome to take electives at the Icahn School of Medicine.
sitename: Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai
cleaned_text: Students in good standing who have not yet received their MD or DO degree are eligible to apply for an elective at the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai. Students should be in their final year of medical school. Eligibility Requirements Applicants who attend LCME-accredited schools in the United States, Canada and Puerto Rico must use the [Visiting Student Learning Opportunity (VSLO)](https://students-residents.aamc.org/visiting-student-learning-opportunities/visiting-student-learning-opportunities-vslo) website. Students must accept offers through VSLO and upload all post-decision requirements one month in advance to the start date.
